mapper.select: select fb.id as id, fb.title as title, fb.content as content, fb.u_id as u_id, fb.file as file, fb.create_at as created_at, fb.update_at as updated_at, fb.delete_at as deleted_at, count(fr.free_board_id) as good_count from free_board as fb left join free_board_recommendation fr on fb.id = fr.free_board_id and fr.good_yn = 'Y' where fb.delete_yn = 'N' group by fb.id, fb.title, fb.content, fb.u_id, fb.file, fb.create_at, fb.update_at, fb.delete_at
mapper.update: update free_board_recommendation set delete_yn = 'N' where free_board_id = #{freeBoardId} and u_id = #{uId}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(m.id, s.group_id) AS id, m.name AS mname ,s.id as subId , s.name , s.row_count, s.`number`, s.background, s.font, s.list_type FROM board_main_category AS m JOIN board_sub_category AS s ON m.id = s.group_id where m.id = #{cate1} AND s.group_id = #{cate1} AND s.id = #{id}
select view from free_board_view where free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board_view SET view = view + 1 WHERE free_board_id = #{freeBoardId}
mapper.select:
SELECT b.*, u.*, COALESCE(rec.count, 0) AS count, v.view FROM free_board AS b JOIN user AS u ON b.u_id = u.u_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT free_board_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM free_board_recommendation WHERE good_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY free_board_id ) AS rec ON b.id = rec.free_board_id LEFT JOIN free_board_view AS v ON v.free_board_id = b.id WHERE b.main_category = #{cate1} AND b.sub_category = #{id} AND b.delete_yn = 'N'
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND u_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10;
